tag_list: developer, inventor, computer-specialist, producer, web-producer, ceo, slovakia, france, europe, sysoon, sysoon-com, sysoon-net
overview: Martin Dano is developer, inventor, computer specialist and web producer. CEO & Founder at Sysoon Sarl from 2006, Sysoon Inc. from 2010. Martin was born (1976) in a small city Humenne situated in Eastern Slovakia, Europe. From 2003 he live in Paris, France. He is author of many innovatory practices in data processing and Internet systems. He is focusing on research and development in information technology and software development and his latest invention is a web application framework developed and marketed by Sysoonâ„¢ Inc. and implemented in many quality websites across the world. Currently, Martin Dano build the Largest Online Death & Obituaries Records Database and write the international standards for Virtual Cemeteries and Online Memorials.
